text: (8 February 1944 â€“ 21 July 2020) was a Japanese fashion designer. He was well known during the 1970s and 1980s. In 1971, he opened his own company, Yamamoto Kansai Company, Ltd., Tokyo. His first collection debuted the same year in London and the United States at Hess's Department Store in Allentown, Pennsylvania. Kansai became well known for creating stage costumes for David Bowie, mainly during his Ziggy Stardust Tour.
